COMMENTS: This should be taken as the most reliable source as it is an official report from the Japanese government 4.5 months following the event; DISPLACED_POPULATION refers to peak evacuees in shelters in the earlier report on 2018/09/11; building damage refers to housing damage where BUILDINGS_DAMAGED is the sum of those partially destroyed and partially damaged. Non-residential damage data also exists in the report (2,456 other non-residential buildings)
